ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is an intensive course and students with less experience of Semitic languages should be prepared for a steep learning curve initially, however Syriac is not that difficult in the end and if work is put in, it is a rewarding experience.
The class provides students with an elementary understanding of ancient Syriac for use in a research setting. I would recommend the course to another student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course taught me the core rules for reading Syriac, a language in which many of the sources I expect to use in my research are written. I look forward to reading some of those relevant texts next semester.
